title: Wanted * T206 Hindu and Old Mill newspaper ads depicting T206 packs/cards* Will pay $$$

posts.post_title: Wanted * T206 Hindu and Old Mill newspaper ads depicting T206 packs/cards* Will pay $$$
posts.post_content:
Posted By: DB
Looking for Old Mill and Hindu ads found in newspapers around 1909- 1910 depicting the baseball cards and packs. Please email me with any questions or of images. Very interested and will pay a fair price. Email kilaartist@aol.com. Also possibility of trade as I have a few double advertisements.

DB
